_header: In this time Christ hath us sent
_description: A Christmas carol — five quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Make we mery in hall & bowr / Thys tyme was born owr savyower’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
In this tyme God hath sentHys own Son to be
                    present…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…On vs all to haue pyteeGod þat ys owr
                    SaviowrExplicit

BLRoy20Ai.First Lines:
Al on this tyme god hath ows ysentHys ovne sone on a
                    present…
BLRoy20Ai.Last Lines: …And god made goon and kyngeAnd empe[rowre]

BLSl2593.First Lines:
In this tyme cryst haght vs sentHis owyn sone in
                    present…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…On vs haue mercy & pete& bryng vs alle to his
                    tour
